dcterms:description: A randomized version of the Chain environment where the agent starts in State 2 and interacts with the MDP for 10^9 steps, receiving rewards for moving left or right.
dcterms:title: Randomized Chain

dcterms:creator: S. Agrawal
R. Jia
dcterms:description: A two-dimensional gridworld maze where the agent must traverse to find a goal that provides a reward, with all other rewards being zero.
dcterms:title: Maze

dcterms:description: Montezuma's Revenge, a notoriously difficult sparse reward environment from the Arcade Learning Environment, used to evaluate the performance of deep reinforcement learning algorithms.
